name: weather_emergency_resources_agent
description: An agent that helps users find nearby emergency resources including shelters, hospitals, and pharmacies using Google Maps API, with route planning and interactive map generation.

skills.name: Find Emergency Shelters
skills.description: Locate emergency shelters within a specified radius of any location.

skills.name: Find Hospitals
skills.description: Search for hospitals and medical facilities near a given location.

skills.name: Find Pharmacies
skills.description: Discover nearby pharmacies for medication and medical supplies.

skills.name: Plan Evacuation Route
skills.description: Generate optimal routes with turn-by-turn directions to emergency resources.

skills.name: Generate Resource Map
skills.description: Create interactive maps with markers for emergency resources and facilities.
